abstract.t: This document defines the 'XML2RFC' version 2 vocabulary; an XML- based language used for writing RFCs and Internet-Drafts.Editorial Note (To be removed by RFC Editor) Discussion of this draft takes place on the XML2RFC mailing list (xml2rfc@ietf.org), which has its home page at <https://www.ietf.org/mailman/listinfo/xml2rfc>.
